prior_knowledge_digest: Students should have a basic understanding of language structure in their native language, such as nouns, verbs, and simple sentence construction. Familiarity with the concept of conjugation and declension in any language is helpful but not required. The goal is to introduce students to Latin as a foundational language that has influenced many modern languages, including English.

misconception_watchlist: Latin is a dead language and not useful
Latin grammar is the same as English grammar

primary: Introduce the Latin alphabet and pronunciation
Familiarize students with basic Latin greetings
Explain the significance of Latin in historical and modern contexts

lesson_flow.description: Welcome students and introduce the course.

lesson_flow.description: Discuss the historical significance of Latin.
lesson_flow.student_action: Participate in discussion and take notes.
